SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT
WHERE R_ACCUSED LIKE '%' || #{searchId} || '%'

SELECT * FROM REPORT
WHERE R_ACCUSED LIKE '%' || #{searchId} || '%'
ORDER BY R_NO DESC

SELECT A.R_ACCUSED, A.R_SITUATION_W_COUNT, A.LAST_REPORT_DATE, A.TOTAL_REPORT_COUNT, B.MB_NAME FROM ( SELECT R_ACCUSED, COUNT(CASE WHEN R_SITUATION = 'W' THEN 1 END) AS R_SITUATION_W_COUNT, MAX(R_DATE) AS LAST_REPORT_DATE, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_REPORT_COUNT FROM REPORT WHERE R_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 7 AND SYSDATE GROUP BY R_ACCUSED ORDER BY TOTAL_REPORT_COUNT DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY ) A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.R_ACCUSED = B.MB_ID

SELECT REPORT.*, MEMBER.mb_Name AS mbName, ACCUSED_MEMBER.mb_Name AS mbSubName, ACCUSED_MEMBER.mb_Date AS mbDate FROM REPORT JOIN MEMBER ON REPORT.R_ACCUSER = MEMBER.MB_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER ACCUSED_MEMBER ON REPORT.R_ACCUSED = ACCUSED_MEMBER.MB_ID WHERE REPORT.R_NO = #{rNo}
SELECT * FROM REPORT JOIN MEMBER ON(R_ACCUSER = MB_ID) WHERE R_ACCUSED = #{rAccused} ORDER BY R_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE R_ACCUSED = #{rAccused} AND R_SITUATION = 'W'

SELECT * FROM MEMBER
WHERE MB_ID LIKE '%' || #{mbId} || '%'
ORDER BY mb_Id ASC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MA.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY MB_ID ORDER BY CASE WHEN ADDR_TYPE = 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, ROWNUM) AS rnk FROM MEMBER_ADDRESS MA ) WHERE rnk = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER
WHERE MB_ID LIKE '%' || #{mbId} || '%'
SELECT SUM(TOTAL) FROM ORDERS WHERE TRUNC(ORDER_DATE, 'MONTH') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH')
SELECT SUM(TOTAL) FROM ORDERS WHERE TRUNC(ORDER_DATE, 'YEAR') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR')
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(P_NO) FROM PARTICIPANTS) AS TOTAL_PARTICIPANTS, (SELECT COUNT(P_NO) FROM PARTICIPANTS WHERE INSTR(UPPER(P_PRODUCT), 'O') > 0) AS PARTICIPANTS_WITH_O_PRODUCT FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMPANY WHERE COM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS MONTH, NVL(SUM(TOTAL), 0) AS TOTAL_SUM FROM ORDERS WHERE ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH'), -5) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') HAVING TO_DATE(MAX(TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')), 'YYYY-MM') < ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH'), 1) ORDER BY TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')

SELECT (SELECT SUM(M_COUNT) FROM MISSING_BOARD WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM M_CREATE_DATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)) AS M_COUNT, (SELECT SUM(DW_COUNT) FROM DW_BOARD WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DW_CREATE_DATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)) AS DW_COUNT, (SELECT SUM(B_COUNT) FROM BOARD WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B_CREATE_DATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)) AS B_COUNT, (SELECT SUM(U_COUNT) FROM USED_BOARD WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM U_CREATE_DATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)) AS U_COUNT, (SELECT SUM(WM_COUNT) FROM WM_BOARD WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM WM_CREATE_DATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)) AS WM_COUNT FROM DUAL
SELECT R_CATEGORY, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM REPORT WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM R_DATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) GROUP BY R_CATEGORY
SELECT * FROM CONTEST WHERE CON_END_DATE >= SYSDATE ORDER BY CON_NO
